titles.title: Nuclear Power Plant Safety Enhancement Act

To establish within the Office of the Inspector General of the Nuclear Regulatory Commission a unit to be charged with auditing the safety analysis and review activities of the Commission and personnel of nuclear power plants licensed by the Commission.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Power.

bill.summary: 5/17/2000--Introduced. Nuclear Power Plant Safety Enhancement Act - Amends the Energy Reorganization Act of 1974 to establish within the Office of the Inspector General of the Nuclear Regulatory Commission (NRC) a unit to audit and review NRC safety analysis, activities, and personnel of NRC nuclear power plant licensees.Authorizes appropriations.
